feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2023-03-16: BORIS v.8.13 is available
entry.content: v.8.13 available. Video real-time rotation and behavior color added, some bugs fixed
entry.summary: v.8.13 available. Video real-time rotation and behavior color added, some bugs fixed

entry.title: 2023-02-27: BORIS App v.0.4 is available
entry.content: BORIS App for Android v.0.4 is available.
entry.summary: BORIS App v.0.4 for Android is available.

entry.title: 2023-02-23: The v.8.11.1 is available
entry.content: v. 8.11.1 is available. Added a frame index column for video observation, bugs fixed and other improvments. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.
entry.summary: v. 8.11.1 is available. Added a frame index column for video observation, bugs fixed and other improvments. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.

entry.title: 2023-01-20: The v.8.9.14 is available
entry.content: v. 8.9.4 is available. Many improvements. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.
entry.summary: v. 8.9.4 is available. Many improvements. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.

entry.title: 2022-11-21: The BETA v. 8.9.4 is available
entry.content: BETA v. 8.9.4 is available. Many improvements. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.
entry.summary: BETA v. 8.9.4 is available. Many improvements. See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-change-log-v.8 for details.
